name: When Fish
description:
In this game you play as a fisherman on the swedish island Käringön. Use your fishing rod as well as your powerful right-hand punch to catch and eliminate the water creatures. Use the fish barrel to gain currency and expand your fishing empire.  

We're planning to continue working on this project at least during the summer, so make sure to follow us on itch.io for future updates and possibly a full release.

Made by:

Carl-Vilhelm Johansson & Melvin Olsson

bord games.
